text: Bridges of Love is a Philippine television drama series. It is broadcast by ABS-CBN. == Cast == * Maja Salvador as Mia Sandoval * Jericho Rosales as Gabriel "Gael" Nakpil * Paulo Avelino as Carlos Antonio / Manuel Nakpil Jr. "JR" == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2015 television series debuts Category:Philippine television series Category:2015 establishments in Asia Category:2010s Philippine television series debuts
title: Bridges of Love
